entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
